CREATE_TABLE: CREATE TABLE users (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, email TEXT, password TEXT, role_id INTEGER, created_at DATETIME, updated_at DATETIME)
INSERT: INSERT INTO users (email, password, role_id, created_at, updated_at) VALUES ($email, $password, $role_id, $created_at, $updated_at)
UPDATE: UPDATE users SET email = $email, password = $password, role_id = $role_id, updated_at = $updated_at WHERE id = $id
